members.name: submittedBy

constantValues: Shows the Microsoft Office Outlook account for the user who submitted the email to Microsoft Dynamics 365.

members.description: Shows the Microsoft Office Outlook account for the user who submitted the email to Microsoft Dynamics 365.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type the greeting and message text of the email.

members.description: Type the greeting and message text of the email.

constantValues: MIME type of the email message data.

members.description: MIME type of the email message data.

constantValues: Indicates that a read receipt is requested.

members.description: Indicates that a read receipt is requested.

members.description: Sender of the email.

constantValues: Shows the email addresses corresponding to the recipients.

members.description: Shows the email addresses corresponding to the recipients.

constantValues: Select whether the sender should receive confirmation that the email was delivered.

members.description: Select whether the sender should receive confirmation that the email was delivered.

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the email is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled email is read-only and can't be edited.

members.description: Shows whether the email is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled email is read-only and can't be edited.

members.name: messageId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the email message. Used only for email that is received.

members.description: Unique identifier of the email message. Used only for email that is received.

members.name: deliveryAttempts

constantValues: Shows the count of the number of attempts made to send the email. The count is used as an indicator of email routing issues.

members.description: Shows the count of the number of attempts made to send the email. The count is used as an indicator of email routing issues.

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.
